contest-event.event-date:
June 12, 1905 D Jarrow Contest
Jarrow Contest 0 Test Piece Contest Jarrow Contest jarrow-contest
Le Pre-aux-Clercs [arr. Godfrey]
Jarrow, Tyne and Wear, England, UK 1st prize £8 and cup, 2nd prize £4, 3rd prize £2, 4th prize £1. 5 bands competed. March contest 1st (£1) Hetton Colliery, 2nd (10s.) Willington Silver.
Feb. 10, 2012, 7:30 p.m. Sept. 6, 2018, 11:11 p.m.
1 Chester-le-Street John Hughes
2 New Brancepeth William Calvert
3 Hetton Silver Band William Straughan
4 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. B. Wright
5 Dunston Silver Unknown
